title: Make Backlog Distribution roll numbers open Student Data Sheet

requirements.summary: Make Backlog Distribution roll numbers clickable to select a student and display the existing StudentDataSheetPanel.
acceptanceCriteria: In Backlog Distribution, each roll number is rendered as an interactive control (e.g., button-like badge) with a clear hover/focus state.
Clicking a roll number sets the currently selected roll number in the dashboard state and displays the existing StudentDataSheetPanel populated with that student's record.
If a roll number from Backlog Distribution does not exist in the currently filtered semester/department dataset, the existing 'Student Not Found' state in StudentDataSheetPanel is shown.
This change does not break the existing SubjectAnalysisList failed-student selection behavior.

file_operations.description: Render each roll number as an interactive control (compose existing shadcn-ui primitives, e.g., Button/Badge styling) with hover/focus states, and call the provided selection callback when clicked. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire BacklogDistributionPanel roll-number clicks to the existing dashboard selection state so StudentDataSheetPanel (already rendered in Subject Analysis tab) shows the selected student's data or the existing 'Student Not Found' state when no match is found. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add an onRollNumberSelect callback prop to BacklogDistributionPanel and pass the existing dashboard roll-number selection handler from SemesterDashboardView.
acceptanceCriteria: BacklogDistributionPanel accepts an optional roll-number selection callback and invokes it with the clicked roll number string.
SemesterDashboardView passes its existing roll-number selection handler to BacklogDistributionPanel.
StudentDataSheetPanel remains rendered only by SemesterDashboardView (single place of truth for selection).

file_operations.description: Extend BacklogDistributionPanel props with an optional onRollNumberSelect callback and invoke it with the clicked roll number string, without adding any Student Data Sheet rendering logic to this panel. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Pass the existing roll-number selection handler (used for SubjectAnalysisList failed-student selection) into BacklogDistributionPanel via the new onRollNumberSelect prop, keeping StudentDataSheetPanel rendered only here. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
